content: the january baby hat designed by diana mckay corvallis mt a simple hat pattern in two versions one which uses doubled fingering yarn and another version that uses a single strand enjoy the result is soft & cozy yarn 1 skein mountain colors tangofoot 100 gm 460 yards doubled yarn version see back for single strand version needles size #6 double pointed needles gauge 5 sts/inch with tangofoot held doubled finished sizes baby-14 toddler-16 this is a stretchy hat hat cuff cast on 70 80 sts round 1-4 knit around a little rolled edge round 5 purl finishing break yarn and run the end through round 6 knit the 10 stitches that are left pull together at the top and sew/weave yarn tail inside the hat broken rib pattern stitch 2 rounds round 1 *k1 p1* repeat around pick up 3sts on the very top of the hat work an round 2 knit all stitches around icord tail for 4 on these 3sts bind off and work these 2 broken rib stitch rounds for weave in the tail tie an overhand top knot twice or 1 5 2 5 your preference end after a knit round block lightly and pop on that cute head next purl around 1 time icord knit 3 stitches do not turn work just slip the stitches to the other end of the dp needle your yarn will hat body be at the wrong end of your work pull the working knit every round until entire hat measures yarn tightly along the back and knit the next row 4 5 6 5 you will start decreases now repeat until you have the i-cord of your desired length your hat should have 70 80 sts crown decreases *start here for toddler size k6 k2tog repeat all around k1 round *start here for baby size k5 k2tog repeat around k1 round 60sts k4 k2tog repeat around k1 round 50sts k3 k2tog repeat around k1 round 40sts k2 k2tog repeat around k1 round 30sts k1 k2tog around k1 round 20sts k2tog around single strand version needles size #3 or #4 double point needles gauge 6 5sts/inch finished sizes baby-14 toddler-16 hat cuff cast on 90 100 sts round 1-4 knit around a little rolled edge round 5 purl round 6 knit broken rib pattern stitch 2 rounds round 1 *k1 p1* repeat around round 2 knit all stitches around work these 2 broken rib stitch rounds for 1 5 2 5 end after a knit round next purl around 1 time hat body knit every round until entire hat measures 4 5 6 5 you will start decreases now your hat should have 90 100 sts crown decreases *start here for toddler size k8 k2tog repeat all around k1 round 90sts *start here for baby size k7 k2tog repeat all around k1 round 80sts k6 k2tog repeat around k1 round 70sts k5 k2tog repeat around k1 round 60sts k4 k2tog repeat around k1 round
